title.native: ラブライブ!スーパースター!! 3期

description: The third season of Love Live! Superstar!!

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Shrine Maiden
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a shrine maiden.

title.native: ラブライブ!スーパースター!! 2期
ラブライブ!スーパースター!! 3期 本編特別パート

name.native: ウィーン・マルガレーテ

node.description:
[Website](http://www.yatate.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yatate_hajime) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/矢立肇) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hajime_Yatate)

Hajime Yatate is a collective pseudonym for [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/)'s staff.

Sakurako’s work is based on her own experiences, with [Sister Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38414/) coming from having a brother, [Strawberry Panic!](https://anilist.co/manga/34974/) coming from attending an all-girls school, and [Baby Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38676/) from having a lot of cousins.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.
Tadashi Kitaoka is a Composite Artist. He features frequently in [Seven Arcs](https://anilist.co/studio/35/Seven-Arcs) productions.

[Website](http://meganebanchow.com/) | [Blog](http://meganebanchow.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MeganeBanchow)

Also worked on the music for Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko as part of the unit Franz Maxwell I.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YohIchi_N) | [Instagram](https://t.co/xeHIbTl8Ut)

Youichi Nishikawa is an art director and background artist. He graduated from Tohoku University of Art and Design and joined Studio Ghibli in 2004. In 2015 he joined the newly established Deho Gallery.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/g_kurosaki1218) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/go.kurosaki.7)__

__Birthplace:__ Yokohama City, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Gou Kurosaki__ is a Japanese CG animator, director and artist affiliated with CG studio Sublimation.

[Website](https://kisayuu.wixsite.com/fallensky) | [Twitter (Main)](https://twitter.com/KISAYU_) | [Twitter (Art)](https://twitter.com/ksyu_pic) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kisayu__/) | [Tumblr](https://kisaragiyuu.tumblr.com/)

Yuu Kisaragi, also known as kisayu, is a Japanese freelance illustrator and designer.

Liella! is an eleven-member Japanese idol group consists of voice actresses portraying their respective characters from the multimedia project, Love Live! Superstar!!. They are signed to the record label Lantis and debuted as a group of five on April 7, 2021 with the single "Hajimari wa Kimi no Sora". Following the addition of new characters to the main story, four new members were announced to join the group as a second generation on May 12, 2022 and first appeared on the single "WE WILL!!" Two more members were announced in Love Live! Days magazine as a third generation on April 28, 2023 and first appeared on the mini-album "Jump Into the New World."

**Members:**
- [Sayuri Date](https://anilist.co/staff/199739/Sayuri-Date) as [Shibuya Kanon](https://anilist.co/character/170243/Kanon-Shibuya)
- [Liyuu](https://anilist.co/staff/150579/Liyuu) as [Keke Tang](https://anilist.co/character/170241/Keke-Tang)
- [Nako Misaki](https://anilist.co/staff/199740/Nako-Misaki) as [Chisato Arashi](https://anilist.co/character/170245/Chisato-Arashi)
- [Naomi Payton](https://anilist.co/staff/199741/Naomi-Payton) as [Sumire Heanna](https://anilist.co/character/170242/Sumire--Heanna)
- [Nagisa Aoyama](https://anilist.co/staff/199742/Nagisa-Aoyama) as [Ren Hazuki](https://anilist.co/character/170244/Ren-Hazuki)
- [Nozomi Suzuhara](https://anilist.co/staff/274781/Nozomi-Suzuhara) as [Kinako Sakurakoji](https://anilist.co/character/272551/Kinako-Sakurakouji)
- [Akane Yabushima](https://anilist.co/staff/262101/Akane-Yabushima) as [Mei Yoneme](https://anilist.co/character/272552/Mei-Yoneme)
- [Wakana Ookuma](https://anilist.co/staff/274778/Wakana-Ookuma) as [Shiki Wakana](https://anilist.co/character/272553/Shiki-Wakana)
- [Aya Emori](https://anilist.co/staff/274780/Aya-Emori) as [Natsumi Onitsuka](https://anilist.co/character/272550/Natsumi-Onitsuka)
- [Yuina](https://anilist.co/staff/283975/Yuina) as [Margarete Wien](https://anilist.co/character/283968/Margarete-Wien)
- [Sakura Sakakura](https://anilist.co/staff/307749/Sakura-Sakakura) as [Tomari Onitsuka](https://anilist.co/character/306242/Tomari-Onitsuka)
